name: Amanti Art Framed Fabric Pinboard 37 x 25, Neutral Linen Pinboard Printed Casual Bulletin Board for Use as a Vision Board or Wall Organization, Hardwood Wedge Chocolate Frame
short_description: Organizational Essential: Turn any wall into a stylish productivity zone! Pin up reminders, photos, cards, invitations, to-dos, and motivational quotes to create the perfect dorm room decor, kitchen command center, or memory and vision board. This decorative yet functional space helps you stay on track while showcasing what matters most. Use it to mount a calendar, highlight family photos, organize weekly tasks, or build a prayer board filled with your dreams and long-term goals. A beautiful way to bring organization, inspiration, and personality to your everyday routine!

Quality Material: The Neutral Linen Pinboard Fabric Vision Board blends casual style with everyday utility. Printed on premium cotton-blend fabric, this design features vibrant, high-resolution giclee artwork that brings color, personality, and inspiration to your organizational space. A beautiful way to keep your ideas bright and your goals in view!

Multifunctional Bulletin Board: This beautifully printed 36 x 24 pinning surface is designed to inspire and is thick enough to hold pins securely in place--perfect for vision boards, mood collages, weekly planning, or everyday organization. While pins are not included, each board is thoughtfully crafted with a sturdy solid back panel, ensuring long-lasting stability and effortless use. A dependable, decorative way to keep your ideas, memories, and must-dos front and center!

Perfect Easy-to-Hang Wall Organizer: Set up your new board in minutes! Built-in D-ring hangers and included courtesy hooks and nails make installation quick and hassle-free. Soft protective bumpers on the back keep your walls safe from marks and scuffs, giving you a worry-free, ready-to-use organizer that looks polished in any space.

Locally Designed, Thoughtfully Made: Crafted with care in Madison, Wisconsin, this piece reflects the perfect blend of style, creativity, and craftsmanship. Each pinboard is made to order, showcasing our commitment to trend-forward design, Midwest values, and supporting meaningful jobs in the community we proudly call home. It's organization with heart--straight from our studio to your space.
product_description: Bring personality and purpose to your walls with this stylish fabric pinboard--where organization meets creativity! Designed by The Creative Bunch Studio, this Casual bulletin board proves that staying organized doesn't have to be dull. The premium fabric surface makes pinning effortless, allowing photos, notes, and keepsakes to sit beautifully without bending or popping out. Perfect for photos, wedding invitations, holiday cards, to-do lists, kids' artwork, and vision-board inspiration, this lightweight, designer pinboard instantly elevates any room. The beautifully framed design works in entryways, bedrooms, living rooms, mudrooms, home offices, and kitchens, adding a polished touch to your family's command center or your personal creative space. Use it to track schedules, organize your week, spark big ideas, or simply display the moments that make you smile. With built-in metal D-ring hangers, this decorative pinboard is easy to mount in seconds--so you can start pinning your style right away. A chic, functional, and uplifting home accent--crafted with care by Amanti Art to make every day a little more inspired
